prompts: Create a mischievous dark-type Pokemon with vibrant colors and long spiky hair.
I want a quirky Pokemon that has a humanoid shape and playful personality traits.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a trickster, combining red and green colors creatively.
Make a Pokemon with a unique design, showcasing a blend of dark and fairy characteristics.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments, with a playful and cunning demeanor.

Show me a Pokemon that combines a bipedal shape with striking visual features and dark elements.
